interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2014/08/06
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Alcohol use'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Harold Cronk'], 'Producers': ['Michael Scott', 'Russell Wolfe', 'David A.R. White', 'Anna Zielinski', 'Elizabeth Travis'], 'Starring': ['Kevin Sorbo', 'Shane Harper', 'David A.R. White'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']}
Review Text: Loved it!  I am a movie lover of all types of movies and I loved this.  I have watched lots of Christian movies but this one may be there very best.  I learned a lot and I was surprised as the movie went on.  Some Christian movies don't have big budgets and some have totally expected endings but this one was different.  The acting was great and I was very impressed with Kevin Sorbo's performance.  I can't wait to watch it again to see what I missed the first time.  I would definitely recommend!
Review Title: Awesome movie!  Can't wait to watch again.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
profile:
The user is a passionate movie enthusiast with a strong affinity for Christian films, particularly those that stand out due to their quality and depth. They appreciate compelling storytelling and are impressed by notable performances, especially from established actors. The user values originality in films, expressing dissatisfaction with common clichés and predictable endings often found in lower-budget productions. They enjoy films that provide new insights or teachings, indicating a desire for meaningful content that offers personal growth or reflection. 

Additionally, the user appreciates accessible features, such as audio descriptions and captions in multiple languages, which suggests a consideration for varied viewing preferences and inclusivity. Overall, the user exhibits a positive attitude toward films that surpass expectations, and they engage deeply enough to watch them multiple times for a fuller understanding. Recommendations from them highlight a desire to share impactful experiences with others.
